name: Davidus Cigars 20th Anniversary Exclusive
additionalNotes: Made for Davidus Cigar's in Maryland, in commemoration of their 20th year in business. A production run of only 400 boxes were produced; they are in a belicoso facing only, with an Ecuadorian Rojiza Connecticut capa. They are classified as a three dot intensity cigar by Davidoff. With an SRP of $21.99 per cigar, and box price of $200.00 before sales tax.
